itunes:title: Ephesians Week 3 with Trillia Newbell
title: Ephesians Week 3 with Trillia Newbell
description:
In this final week of our Ephesians series, Raechel and Amanda sit down with author, acquisitions editor, and auditory delight, Trillia Newbell. Reading through the last two chapters of Ephesians, the three women explore how the gospel reframes our relationships under the grace and authority of Christ. From Ephesus to the East Tennessee mountains, their questions and conversation point to the redeeming work of Jesus and the beautiful mystery of God’s kindness.

Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 3 of the She Reads Truth Ephesians reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the Ephesians Reading Plan collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Save 15% on your first Subscription Box when you use the code BOX15.

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/ephesians-week-3-with-trillia-newbell/
